title: Our Server Room is a DISASTER...
tags: our server room is WAY too loud
description: See what makes Gorgias different from other help desks at   Create your build at   The server room at the new lab building is right in the middle of the office space and as such, needs some serious sound deadening. Today, we remedy that with inexpensive materials that anyone can DIY sound deaden with!
